markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Dogma](/Feats.aspx?ID=697) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 224 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=5)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Dogma](/Feats.aspx?ID=696)

</column>

---

You gain one [cleric feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=5/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your cleric level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another cleric feat.
name: Advanced Dogma
